title: Struggle for China: the story of the Chinese revolution (D)
brief_description: Using a wide variety of material drawn from Archives including propaganda material filmed by American, Chinese Communist, Nationalist and Japanese cameramen, this film reconstructs events in China from 1900-1949, one of the bloodiest and most turbulent periods in history. Narrated by James Mason. WARNING: SOME SCENES MAY DISTURB
